name: Eshed Ohn-Bar
content: Eshed Ohn-Bar About | News | Team | Publications | Activity | Scholar Eshed Ohn-Bar Assistant Professor Boston University Email: eohnbar [at] gmail [dot] com About At Boston University, I'm heading the Human-to-Everything (H2X) Lab. Our overarching goal is to develop intelligent technologies with robust autonomy and real-time assistance capabilities. Our research spans machine intelligence, computer vision, and systems for human-machine interaction. I'm looking for two PhD students this year. If you are interested in joining the lab to research machine learning and perception for intelligent systems, please email me your CV. News Thank you NSF for a CAREER award on personalizing multimodal agents from user feedback! I'm honored to have received the 2025 BU College of Engineering Early Career Excellence in Research Award. We are co-organizing the fourth workshop on accessibility, computer vision, and agent systems at CVPR 2025 [website and challenge] Read about our collaboration with Motional to ensure autonomous vehicles are accessible to individuals with visual impairments. Thank you NSF for supporting our research in robust mobile systems (grant IIS-2152077). Our Senior Design Project received the BU Engineering Design Excellence Award! We are semifinalists in the DOT Inclusive Design Challenge! Press release More info Best paper award at the Web for All conference. Received a Humboldt fellowship, visiting MPI and working with Andreas Geiger. I am honored to have received the 2017 IEEE Intelligent Transportation Systems Society best PhD dissertation award. Best Student Paper Award Finalist at ICPR 2016. Best Industry Related Paper Award Finalist at ICPR 2014. Best Paper Award at CVPR-AMFG 2013. Team Zhongkai Shangguan (PhD) Hee Jae Kim (PhD) Lei Lai (PhD) Masaki Kuribayashi (PhD, Visiting from Waseda University) Maolin Wei (PhD) Seyed Reza Sajjadinasab (PhD) Jiatong Guo (PhD) Zekai Yin (MS) Adwait Kulkarni (MS) Gaston Longhitano (MS) Tianyou Lou (BS) Shival Shah (BS) Varsha Singh (BS) Audrey Wang (BS) Matthew Kweon (BS) Kevin Liu (BS) Lillian Chung (BS) Past Members Jim Zhang (now at Zoox) Ruizhao Zhu (now at Amazon) Wanzhou Liu (now at UPitt) Zanming Huang (now at OSU) Jason Lee (now at UoWash, Ai2) Shuhei Fujita (now at Arista) Fadi Kidess (now at BU, PhD) Kathakoli Sengupta (now at Wicket) Mariia Kharchenko (now at UMD) Kevin Vogt-Lowell (now at MIT) Shun Zhang (now at UCSD) Luca Guidi (now at UIUC) Matt Boyd (now at MIT) Minglan Zheng (now at CMU) Ameera Iftekhar (now at Anduril) Anish Yennapusa (now at AWS) For code and project pages, please see our GitHub repo.
